text.div:
This code system https://openimis.github.io/openimis_fhir_r4_ig/CodeSystem/bill-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
claim-batch Claim batch paymentHow much the insurance need to pay the HF for the claims reimbursment.
commission CommissionHow much the insurance need to pay the commission to EO.
fees FeesHow much the insurance need to pay the payment platform for the fee for payment service.

name: BillTypeCS
title: Type (Bill Invoice)
description: Indicates the Type for Bill. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

concept.definition: How much the insurance need to pay the HF for the claims reimbursment.
How much the insurance need to pay the commission to EO.
How much the insurance need to pay the payment platform for the fee for payment service.
